name: Mythic Slayer
text:
A paragon slayer is an implacable force on the battlefield. Your weapon becomes an extension of your body. It moves with unmatched speed, fluidity, and force. Few foes can withstand your attacks for long.
    You have hacked and slashed your way through numerous foes and endless challenges to reach a state of near-perfect battle prowess. Your weapon has become an almost living extension of your hands and arms, and you can make it perform in ways few other warriors can imagine. The time has come to carve a new legend from the corpses of your fallen enemies.

features.level11ImprovedPowerStrike(11thLevel): You gain one more use of power strike per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn
features.mythicAssault(11thLevel): When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points using a melee weapon attack, you gain a bonus to your next melee weapon damage roll before the end of the encounter
features.mythicSlayer'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can use a free action to make a melee basic attack either before or after the extra action
features.level12MythicSlayerGreaterWeaponSpeciali: You gain one of the following encounter powers of your choice
